title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 20, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 20, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb and McIntyre react to the Clippers falling to the Mavericks in Game 2 of their opening round series and question how great Luka Doncic can be. The guys debate which L.A. team is in more trouble and explain why it’s time to split up the Sixers! Plus, they find an answer for why the NBA’s ratings have declined! Plus, they weigh in on Thom Brenneman’s awkward apology and speak with FS1 NBA analyst Ric Bucher! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
